A #TrumpShutdown of the southern border would crush California & Texas’s economies. Hundreds of billions in business lost. Texas alone could lose a million jobs. 

@realDonaldTrump is taking people’s lives hostage.

$615 billion & over a million jobs. That’s what our President is holding hostage by threatening to close the border. He would fire a million Americans over a political promise that won’t work. 

Just as with his business @realDonaldTrump doesn’t care who loses as long as he wins.
@SecNielsen this is the second child in a month. What is going on at @DHSgov? Does @HouseHomeland have to start subpoenaing you to get the truth?

Tragic Breaking News on Christmas Morning. I’m working to find out more. This will not go unanswered.

@realDonaldTrump publicly said he’d welcome a government shutdown. This is no way to lead our great nation.

@SecWilkie - The passage of the Farm Bill means #CBD is now legal. @DeptVetAffairs needs to start researching how this new medicine can help vets living w/ #TBI & #PTSD. Let’s get to work for our #veterans.
